perturbation.original_text: Termination under this Section 12 shall be effective from the date      written  notice is delivered or the date  specified in the written  notice.      whichever is later.
perturbation.changed_text: Termination under this Section 12 shall be effective from the date written notice is delivered. Notwithstanding the above, termination is only effective if acknowledged in writing by the other party within 10 days of the notice being delivered.
perturbation.explanation: The original termination clause specifies that termination is effective either on the date of notice delivery or the date specified in the notice. The modified version adds the condition of written acknowledgement from the other party, creating a contradiction. This could lead to disputes over whether a termination is valid if the other party doesn't acknowledge it, even if proper notice was given.
